text: (minisune!) obata pera visu bohomayak paramparavanvaovun karamin siti aparadhayanhi hetuven niyata vasayenma api vinasa kara dæmuvemu. ovun veta (apa visin) yavanu læbu ovunge dutayin pæhædili sadhakayanma gena avaha. ehet (eva) ovun visvasa kale næta. væradi karana anit janatavatada me andamatama api phalavipaka (laba di danduvam) karamu
